mapper.select: select c.BO_NO as attBo,b.BO_NO as replyBo,a.*,b.*,c.* from freeboard a left outer join freereply b on(a.bo_no = b.bo_no) left outer join attatch c on (a.bo_no = c.bo_no) where a.bo_no=#{boNo} order by a.bo_no desc

select count(*) from freeboard
order by a.bo_date
mapper.update: update freeboard set bo_hit = bo_hit+1 where bo_no = #{boNO}
update freeboard set bo_rec = bo_rec+1 where bo_no = #{boNO}
update freeboard set bo_rep = bo_rep+1 where bo_no = #{boNO}
